text: tatha un (munaafiqon) mein se kuchh nabee ko duhkh dete hain aur kahate hain ki vah bade sunava[1] hain. aap kah den ki vah tumhaaree bhalaee ke lie aise hain. vah allaah par eemaan rakhate hain aur eemaan vaalon kee baat ka vishvaas karate hai aur unake lie daya hain, jo tumamen se eemaan laaye hain aur jo allaah ke rasool ko duhkh dete hain, unake lie duhkhadaayee yaatana hai
